fields.title: FE Assignment Description
fields.description:
Intro

Imagine you have the list of Requirements, and each requirement has a field that will represent a specific description for that requirement.

Each field should be a Rich Editor that will enable users to precisely describe what the requirement is all about, and what key points Engineers should pay attention to.


First part

Since each field from the item (Requirement) is a standalone Rich Editor, we need to find a way to move throughout the document (everything within current black border) seamlessly just like in every other text editor.
Meaning, our cursor should know where to jump from one active editor to another.

You can try it in this "document", try reaching FE Assignment Description (heading field) only by navigating the cursor with you keyboard arrows. Navigating with your arrows should work the same like it does in this larger field when you navigate from paragraph to paragraph.

Remember! Each field is a separated Rich Editor, you can see it highlighted when you hover on this document.


Second part

On the right side of the document, we have a sidebar that displays all information about the Requirement that is currently in the focus. When we move our cursor from field to field, we want to make sure that if we jump from one Requirement to another Requirement, to also update the description displayed in the sidebar.
